briefTitle: Study of Phenoptin in Subjects With Phenylketonuria Who Participated in Protocols PKU-004 or PKU-006
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Multicenter, Open-Label Extension Study of Phenoptin in Subjects With Phenylketonuria Who Participated in Protocols PKU-004 or PKU-006
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety of long-term treatment with Phenoptin in subjects with phenylketonuria (PKU) who participated in Phase 3 clinical studies with Phenoptin.

primaryOutcome.measure: Tabulation of the Incidence and Frequency of All AEs and SAEs That Occur Throughout the Study.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline through Final Visit (a Maximum of 30 months) with AEs collected at month 3 and 6 then at 6 month intervals
